articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: ACLU sues Oklahoma over law prohibiting critical race theory topics from being taught in schools - CNN
articles.description: A group of students and educators has filed a complaint challenging an Oklahoma law that restricts teaching about race and gender, in what the American Civil Liberties Union calls the first federal lawsuit to challenge such a statewide ban.

articles.title: Haiti Gang Seeks $17 Million For Releasing Kidnapped US Missionaries - NDTV
articles.description: A Haitian gang that kidnapped a group of American and Canadian missionaries is asking for $17 million -- or $1 million each -- to release them, according to a top Haitian official.
articles.content:
A Haiti minister confirmed that kidnappers have demanded $1 million per kidnapped person. (File)

articles.title: Kudlow: Manchin, Sinema 'make a lovely couple' fighting Democrats' spend and tax agenda - Fox News
